title: Grand Wedding Celebration
short_description: A spectacular wedding ceremony with all the bells and whistles.

details.long_description: Join us for a two-day extravaganza celebrating the union of John and Jane. It will be a weekend filled with love, laughter, and memories that will last a lifetime. From the elegant ceremony to the lively reception, this wedding is not to be missed.

title: Birthday Bash
short_description: A fun-filled birthday celebration for all ages.

details.long_description: Come and celebrate Sarah's 30th birthday in style! We have planned an exciting day filled with games, delicious food, and a surprise live band performance. It's a party you won't want to miss.

title: Silver Anniversary Soiree
short_description: A glamorous silver anniversary celebration for a loving couple.

details.long_description: Join us as we celebrate 25 years of love and togetherness with John and Mary. This elegant evening will include a romantic dinner, dancing, and a heartfelt speech from the couple. Dress in your finest attire and be part of this special milestone.

title: Engagement Extravaganza
short_description: A joyful engagement party to celebrate love and commitment.

details.long_description: Join us as we toast to the newly engaged couple, Alex and Emily. The evening will be filled with love, laughter, and a surprise proposal reenactment that you won't want to miss. It's a night of celebration and romance.

title: Retirement Celebration
short_description: A farewell party to honor years of hard work and dedication.

details.long_description: Join us as we bid farewell to Mark, who has dedicated 40 years to the company. It's time to celebrate his retirement with a memorable party. There will be speeches, gifts, and plenty of nostalgia as we honor his incredible career.

title: Baby Shower Celebration
short_description: A joyful celebration of the upcoming arrival of a new bundle of joy.

details.long_description: Join us as we shower Sarah with love and gifts to welcome her little one into the world. It's a day of games, laughter, and cute baby-themed decorations. Let's celebrate this exciting chapter in Sarah's life!
